Crews were on the scene of a house fire in Akron Thursday morning where two people were injured.

Firefighters responded to a fire on the 500 block of Cheyenne Blvd at about 9:50 a.m.

Investigators on the scene say the fire was accidental, but the exact cause of the fire is still under investigation.

Two people received injuries in the fire, one person suffered burns and smoke inhalation, the other suffered from smoke inhalation.

Courtesy of Media Partner KTIV
